question: The term hit wicket in cricket refers to
option1: when the bowler bowls out three batsman with three successive balls
option2: when the batsman intercepts the ball with his leg or any part of his body between the wicket
option3: when the batsman, while hitting the ball, strikes his own wicket with his bat or body and is declared out
answer: when the batsman, while hitting the ball, strikes his own wicket with his bat or body and is declared out
